entry.title: Equivariant K-classes of matrix orbit closures
entry.summary: We show that the equivariant $K$-theory class of an orbit closure ${GL_r(k)\,v\,(k^\times)^n}$ of $r\times n$ matrices depends only on the matroid of the matrix $v$. This result is obtained by providing a splitting to the natural surjection from the $GL_r(k) \times (k^\times)^n$ equivariant $K$-theory of the space of matrices to the $(k^\times)^n$ equivariant $K$-theory of the Grassmannian. As consequences, the same is true of the equivariant cohomology class of this orbit, as well as of the isomorphism types of the cyclic $GL_r(k)$ or $S_n$-module generated by the tensor product of the columns of $v$. We give formulae for certain coefficients of these matroid invariants, and for the entire invariants in some cases, as well as formulae for the behavior of these invariants under certain matroid operations. We also give generators for the ideal of the orbit closure up to radical.
